title: kOrina varam-osagu
sahitya:
kOrina varam-osagumayya kOdaNDapANi


anupallavi

  vArijAstra janaka shrI vatsAnga niSkaLanka


caraNam    sarivArilOna nannu cauka jEyavaladu nIdu marugu joccinAnu nannu mAnamutO kApADu
paricara vAnara samUha pApa dahana vArivAha karirAja varada venkaTEshvara murAri gadA
